oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #108
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #108, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers (also introduced as the Oklahoma Wranglers), Roy Wiggins, and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers; Oklahoma Wranglers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- I'm Thinking Tonight Of My Blue Eyes (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Little Angel With A Dirty Face (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton introduces the Oklahoma Wranglers -- You Don't Love Me But I'll Always Care (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Oh! Susanna (Skeeter Willis fiddle) -- Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold talk -- Someday (You'll Want Me To Want You) (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Eddy Arnold, Hal Horton) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Wiggins, Roy; Willis Brothers; Oklahoma Wranglers (Musical group); Willis, Guy, 1915-1981; Willis, Skeeter, -1976
